verifyEmail.subject: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.preview: Verify your email address for YAPP
verifyEmail.heading: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.body: Thanks for signing up! Please verify your email address to get started. This link will expire in 24 hours.
verifyEmail.fallback: Or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
verifyEmail.footer: If you did not create an account with YAPP, you can safely ignore this email. Someone may have entered your email address by mistake.
